long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hello Genshin Impact player !
By using this extension you will be able to track your resin counter by typing your current resin count in the main field. After that, the extension will generate 1 resin every 8 minutes like the game does.

Using this extension you will be able to see how many resin you get without connecting to the game, so, you will be able to use this time to make other useful thing.
Note that this extension doesn't sync with the game, so, you have to update your resin counter when you consume resin in-game.

You will never be full of resin again with this extension
